S.FORM: === An-ta-man-subal 安達曼群島原住民 === ayda idaw ku sepatay nu binacadan, Taan-taman-zen "Strait Island", Ciwluo-wa-zen, Wunci-zen atu Santi-neie-zen. Anta-man subalan a mapuletay nu lumeniay a tademaw caay tu pikihatiya tu kitakid, kaisa atu i hekalay atademaw masasuadih. picidekan tu Santi-neie-zen mikitalakaw tu duma a kitidaan nu tademaw, palecad tu talakaw han makaala tu caynem-sep – caynem-lim kunhu ku talakaw, caay kaw apulet ku sausi tu nuhenian " mapuletay han a caylim-sep kunhun", nipisausi ayda nu maudipay cacay tu a malebut ku maudipay. Ciwluo-wa a binacadan tulim-sep – sipsep-sep ku tademaw. 目前有4族: 250-400人.

=== An-ta-man-sobal 安達曼群島原住民 === ayda idaw ko sepatay no binacadan, Taan-taman-zen "Strait Island", Ciwloo-wa-zen, Wonci-zen ato Santi-neie-zen. Anta-man sobalan a mapoletay no lomeniay a tademaw caay to pikihatiya to kitakid, kaisa ato i hekalay atademaw masasoadih. picidekan to Santi-neie-zen mikitalakaw to doma a kitidaan no tademaw, palecad to talakaw han makaala to caynem-sep – caynem-lim konho ko talakaw, caay kaw apolet ko saosi to nohenian " mapoletay han a caylim-sep konhon", nipisaosi ayda no maodipay cacay to a malebot ko maodipay. Ciwloo-wa a binacadan tolim-sep – sipsep-sep ko tademaw. 目前有4族: 250-400人.
